job_history.role: I was the tech lead of multiple in-house software projects where I worked with students to develop real products using modern frontend frameworks like React or Angular. I've mentored nearly 100 people and helped them to change their careers to become junior developers.

I was not only a lone wolf, but usually a participant in larger teams. I closely collaborated with designers and clients to fully understand their needs and turn them into living and breathing products.
Co-founded a startup to build a browser based video editing platform. The product went through multiple iterations as we conducted user research. I've built all frontend code and lead UX design.
I've created a desktop app based on AdobeAIR (html/js) to collect and analyze music from top blogs with my own search bot. The project relied heavily on SoundCloud API.

As the lead developer I helped to translate client needs to production ready specifications. I was really happy to be part of a project where based on my idea a project for Volkswagen took off and the company won the top Effie award.

We were a small web development firm focused on delivering custom solutions for companies. I was the head of development and my tasks ranged from leading small teams with active development to writing specifications for outsourcing.
